p: A 55-year-old male presented with a 7-day history of fevers, cough, and hypoxia. Comorbidities include well controlled HIV infection (diagnosed 2006, current CD4 + cell count 422 cells/μl (35.6%), HIV-1 viral load <20 copies/ml), on emtricitabine/tenofovir disoproxil 200/245 mg and raltegravir 1200 mg once daily; and mild asthma. He had no prior history of PJP, was an ex-smoker, lived with his partner, and neither had recent travel histories nor contact with confirmed COVID-19 cases.
